function.name: fn_Verify_TirePressure_Without_DRW
function.description: fn_Verify_TirePressure - Function to verify tire pressure screen without DRW enabled

parameter.value: Function's XML file name: fn_TPMS.xml
'TIRE PRESSURE' title is displayed
'TIRE PRESSURE' title is not displayed
'Low Tire' is displayed
'Low Tire' is not displayed
'TIRE PRESSURE (PSI)/(KPA))' content is displayed
'TIRE PRESSURE (PSI)/(KPA)' content is not displayed
'RECOMMENDED COLD PRESSURE' is displayed
'RECOMMENDED COLD PRESSURE' is not displayed
'Front' label is displayed
'Front' label not displayed
'Rear' label is displayed
'Rear' label not displayed
'Front Left Tire Value' is displayed
'Front Left Tire Value' is not displayed
'Front Right Tire Value' is displayed
'Front Right Tire Value' is not displayed
'Rear Left Outer Tire Value' is displayed
'Rear Left Outer Tire Value' is not displayed
'Rear Right Outer Tire Value' is displayed
'Rear Right Outer Tire Value' is not displayed

'TIRE PRESSURE' content is not clicked

'Rear Right Outer Tire Value' is not displayed

'Back' button is not displayed on TPMS screen

function.name: fn_Navigate_BackFromTirePressureMonitoringSystem_To_VehicleInfo
function.description: fn_Navigate_BackFromTirePressureMonitoringSystem_To_VehicleInfo - Function to click on back button of Tire Pressure Monitoring System screen

parameter.value: Function's XML file name: fn_TPMS.xml
Navigated to vehicle info screen - back button is clicked on tire pressure monitoring system screen
Not navigated to vehicle info screen - back button is not clicked on tire pressure monitoring system screen

function.name: fn_Click_Verify_RecommendedColdPressure_Information
function.description: fn_Click_Verify_RecommendedColdPressure_Information - Function to click and verify recommended cold pressure information

parameter.value: Function's XML file name: fn_TPMS.xml
'RECOMMENDED COLD PRESSURE' title is clicked
'RECOMMENDED COLD PRESSURE' title is not clicked
'Recommended Cold Pressure' title is displayed
'Recommended Cold Pressure' title is not displayed
'The tire pressure when the vehicle has been stationary' content is displayed
'The tire pressure when the vehicle has been stationary' content is not displayed
'to the recommended cold tire inflation pressure.' content is displayed
'to the recommended cold tire inflation pressure.' content is not displayed
'Tire pressures must be set to specification when tires are' content is displayed
'Tire pressures must be set to specification when tires are' content is not displayed
'Learn more about proper tire care on the Ford Owner site.' link is displayed
'Learn more about proper tire care on the Ford Owner site.' link is not displayed
'Back button' of recommended cold pressure is displayed
'Back button' of recommended cold pressure is not displayed

function.name: fn_Navigate_BackFromRecommendedColdTireInflationPressure_To_VehicleInfo
function.description: fn_Navigate_BackFromRecommendedColdTireInflationPressure_To_VehicleInfo - Function to click on back button of recommended cold tire inflation pressure screen

parameter.value: Function's XML file name: fn_TPMS.xml
Navigated to vehicle info screen - back button is clicked on recommended cold pressure screen
Not navigated to vehicle info screen - back button is not clicked on recommended cold pressure screen
